definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to make the most of one's youthfulness in one's choice of employment (e.g. modeling)
lit. one's youth will never return/to make the most of one's opportunities (idiom)

sentences.english: Wu Pan chooses or eat green meal.
sentences.chinese: 吴盼选择还是吃青春饭。

sentences.english: Embracing warm blood, I sing of youth without regret. Look upon the horizon and know not when my ally would return.
sentences.chinese: 满腔热血唱出青春无悔，望穿天涯不知战友何时回。

sentences.english: Our goal was to find a fragrance that women and men would associate with youth.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是找到一种让人觉得能永葆青春的芳香。

sentences.english: Appollo stood for youth and manly beauty.
sentences.chinese: 阿波罗象征着青春和阳刚之美。

sentences.english: One chooses one thing over another and people always think 'there could have been a better way'.
sentences.chinese: 张颐武认为，青春更多的是一个精神层面上的概念。

sentences.english: It is the tea of the earth that keep here smiles in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 是大地的泪点，使她的微笑连结着青春不谢。

sentences.english: Youth does not lose, love will win.
sentences.chinese: 青春不言输，爱拼才会赢。

sentences.english: Such youth and prettiness reacted upon him more subtly than wine.
sentences.chinese: 如此青春的美色，比醇酒更令他沉醉入迷。

sentences.english: The golden school-time days have gone down in youth history and will not come back again.
sentences.chinese: 金色的学生时代，已载入了青春史册，一去不复还。

sentences.english: I am weak from my youth in the horse over.
sentences.chinese: 我从我单薄的青春里打马而过。

sentences.english: Youth is sadness, bright and beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 小四说，青春是道明媚的忧伤。

sentences.english: Remembering the past, I can not waste my youth any more.
sentences.chinese: 想想过去的点滴，觉得自己真的不能再浪费青春了。
青春是生命中播种的季节。

sentences.english: Stay young forever, Yoga, Its time to stop.
sentences.chinese: 青春不老，瑜伽，让时间就此驻留。

sentences.english: My teenaged nephew's face is covered with zits.
sentences.chinese: 我那正值青春期的侄子脸上长满青春痘。

sentences.english: My teenaged nephew's face is covered with zits.
sentences.chinese: 我那正值青春期的侄子脸上长满青春痘。

definition: lit. one's youth will never return/to make the most of one's opportunities (idiom)
full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous/energetic/a bright spark
